00001 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00002 #import "/usr/include/sqlite3.h"
00003 #import "DatabaseHelper.h"
00004 
00005 
00006 @implementation DatabaseHelper
00007 
00008 + (sqlite3 *)getDatabase {
00009         if (database == NULL) {
00010 #pragma default_cache_size = 1;
00011                 
00012                 // Attempt to open up the database.  If it fails, die horribly in a fire.
00013                 if (sqlite3_open([[self dataFilePath] UTF8String], &database) != SQLITE_OK) {
00014                         sqlite3_close(database);
00015                         NSAssert(0, @"Failed to open database.");
00016                 }
00017         }
00018         
00019         return database;
00020 }
00021 
00022 + (void)closeDatabase {
00023         if (database == NULL) return;
00024         
00025         sqlite3_close(database);
00026         
00027         // Null out the pointer.  If somebody tries getting a connection to the database,
00028         // a new one will be created.
00029         database = NULL;
00030 }
00031 
00032 + (NSString *)dataFilePath {
00033     // First, test for existence.
00034         NSError *error;
00035     NSFileManager *fileManager = [NSFileManager defaultManager];
00036     NSArray *paths = NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(NSDocumentDirectory, NSUserDomainMask, YES);
00037     NSString *documentsDirectory = [paths objectAtIndex:0];
00038     NSString *writableDBPath = [documentsDirectory stringByAppendingPathComponent:kDatabaseName];
00039         
00040     if (![fileManager fileExistsAtPath:writableDBPath]) {
00041                 // The writable database does not exist, so copy the default to the appropriate location.
00042                 NSString *defaultDBPath = [[[NSBundle mainBundle] resourcePath] stringByAppendingPathComponent:kDatabaseName];
00043                 if (![fileManager copyItemAtPath:defaultDBPath toPath:writableDBPath error:&error]) {
00044                         NSAssert(0, @"Failed to create writable database file.");
00045                 }
00046         }
00047         
00048         return writableDBPath;
00049 }
00050 
00051 @end
